channel.title: Caompiler Error! Need some help

item.title: Caompiler Error! Need some help
item.dc:creator: @Problem Problem
item.description:
@Problem wrote:

Delete all that and paste this there:

@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit

Read full topic

item.title: Caompiler Error! Need some help
item.dc:creator: @newserver newserver
item.description:
@newserver wrote:

ok here is my advice to you, use jdk6, and if you have jdk 6.0u11 r=update, then i suggest it says this for filepath of ur jdk “C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_11\bin\java.exe”

item.title: Caompiler Error! Need some help
item.dc:creator: @thepker13 thepker13
item.description:
@thepker13 wrote:

I tried to run my compiler but it says i dont have jdk 5 or 6 but i do have jdk 5 what do i do so i can get it to work?
Here is the code of the compiler i have:

@echo off
echo SinisterScape ownz
title SiniserScape Compiler
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java\Jdk1.5.0_17”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%program files%\java\jdk1.5.0_17\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit

Please help me so i can compile

Read full topic
